title: Insurance Code
context: ยง431:10C-112.5 Notice of cancellation for insurer ceasing to issue motor vehicle insurance policies. Any insurer authorized to issue motor vehicle insurance policies, which ceases to engage in the motor vehicle insurance business in this State, shall give written notice to each insured not less than sixty days prior to the effective date of closing its business. [L 1992, c 123, pt of ยง1; am L 1997, c 251, ยง23]
